body:
Comment 5: 
I do not like it. 23 files to replace 3 - is way too complicated for my taste. And I did
not really tried using it yet. Perhaps one day, when the process will get really
complicated (I really hope not <g>). But it is trivial at the moment. I really see
no benefit.

But I am not the only one who makes the call. If you would like to go ahead with it,
then you have to follow these http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html instructions.

Alex
